alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:33PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5 AM Wednesday, the stage was 3.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.0 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.2 Wed 5 am CST 4.7 5.0 4.8 &&
